question.title: What is the primary cause of phimosis?
question.description: A condition where the foreskin cannot be fully retracted

option_a.title: Inadequate hygiene
option_a.description: A lack of proper cleaning and care of the genital area

option_b.title: Tight foreskin
option_b.description: A condition where the foreskin is too tight and cannot be retracted

option_c.title: Infection or inflammation
option_c.description: An infection or inflammation of the foreskin or surrounding tissue

option_d.title: Genetic predisposition
option_d.description: A genetic condition that affects the development of the foreskin

correct_option.title: B
correct_option.description: The letter of the correct answer
